metadata.synopsis: Followup dialog with Wulbren after siding with him in the Foundry Outcome. He promises the player to back them up in the END fight.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AGo to -1935; -7; 206Use Debug Book to get runepowder bomb(Set quest flags and options > Act 3 Low > 10. Steel Watch Foundry > 5. Get Runepowder BombClick Neural Switchboard > 3. Carefully place the Rune Bomb Powder) wait for the explosion cinematic to finishobserve the cutscene.Choose to side with Wulbren against the Gondians, and kill them.Click on Wulbren to trigger this dialog

1.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
1.text: The Gondian menace is finally over - now is the time for the Ironhand Gnomes.

0.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
0.text: A true leader never forgets those who lifted him up.

2.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
2.text: When the time comes, you may call on the Ironhand Gnomes. We will fight with you to defend this city - it is ours, after all.
